author: Simon Difford
description: Use a great pisco and you'll have a wonderfully complex drink.
name: Pini
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml White crème de cacao liqueur
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
